item.title: ILogger<TCategory> with Azure App Service Application Insights + Live Metrics
Kusto Query Cheatsheet for Application Insights
item.description: Request Duration Distribution (100ms bins) app("bustroker-sales-webapi").requests | where name == "POST SalesController/Post" | project req_timestamp = timestamp, req_id = id, req_name = name, req_url = url, req_success = success, req_resultCode = resultCode, req_duration = duration, req_operation_name = operation_Name, req_operation_Id = operation_Id | summarize count() by bin(req_duration, 100) | sort by req_duration asc | render timechart Request and Dependency Duration Percentiles Calculate percentiles (p25, p50, p95, p99) for core requests and their dependencies:
